data.question: What is the chemical formula of Th6-Me2BPDC-10?

What was the occupancy of uranium atoms in Zr6U0.87-Me2BPDC-8?
Did the Th6-TPDC-NH2-12 structure show coordination of the uranyl unit to the metal node after washing?
What was the reason for the high R(int) value in the checkCIF report for Zr6-Me2BPDC(TPDC-DEPU)?
data.answer: The high R(int) is because of the moderately crystalline, weakly diffracting crystal with extensive solvent disorder

data.answer: The Bruker APEX3, SAINT+ and SADABS programs

data.question: What was the reported formula weight (FW) for Th6-Me2BPDC-10?
What was the crystal system for Th6-TPDC-NH2-12?
What was the reason for the large Hirshfeld difference between C4 and C8 in the checkCIF report?
data.answer: Larger displacement parameter for terminal methyl group C8 compared to phenyl carbon C4
